BodyName: Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the posting of lithium-ion battery safety guides in places of business and online retail platforms that sell powered mobility devices
Items.MatterName: Requiring the posting of lithium-ion battery safety guides in places of business and online retail platforms that sell powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to third-party delivery workers and powered bicycle safety
Items.MatterName: Third-party delivery workers and powered bicycle safety.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating licensing requirements for electric bicycle or scooter businesses
Items.MatterName: Creating licensing requirements for electric bicycle or scooter businesses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the requirement of food vendors to obtain a certificate of authority to collect sales tax
Items.MatterName: Requirement of food vendors to obtain a certificate of authority to collect sales tax.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to record keeping and reporting on the disposal of rechargeable batteries used for powered mobility devices
Items.MatterName: Record keeping and reporting on the disposal of rechargeable batteries used for powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to vending on bridges
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to safety standards for powered bicycles and powered mobility devices used for food delivery services.
Items.MatterName: Safety standards for powered bicycles and powered mobility devices used for food delivery services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting vending or vendor-related activity in bicycle lanes
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting vending or vendor-related activity in bicycle lanes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to vendor display and storage of goods, and to repeal sections 17-313 and 20-463 of such code, relating to bookkeeping requirements
Items.MatterName: Vendor display and storage of goods, and to repeal sections 17-313 and 20-463 of such code, relating to bookkeeping requirements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the misdemeanor criminal penalties for general vendors and mobile food vendors
Items.MatterName: Repealing the misdemeanor criminal penalties for general vendors and mobile food vendors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to permitting street vendors to vend within two feet from the curb
Items.MatterName: Permitting street vendors to vend within two feet from the curb.
